title: Diagnose Unusual Noise
description: A customer reports a 'clicking' noise from the front wheel when turning.

tasks.description: Gather details from the customer about when the noise occurs (e.g., speed, turning left/right).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent notes the noise happens when turning right at low speeds.

tasks.description: Based on the description, search the knowledge base for possible causes.
tasks.expected_outcome: The knowledge base suggests the most likely cause is a failing CV joint.

tasks.description: Advise the customer to schedule a service appointment for a technician to physically inspect the suspension and drivetrain components.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent explains the likely issue and books an appointment for confirmation.
